query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST116 SET CS116_MUT = 53224, CS116_PST = 'A5', CS116_BJT = SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8), CS116_BJJ = #G_USER_ID#, UPDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.10.29 Han J.H UPZET = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.10.29 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = #PJT# AND CS116_BSU = #BSU# AND CS116_AGB = #AGB# AND CS116_PST = #PST# AND CS116_GND = #GND#
